data.title: Death at a Funeral
data.text:
Death at a Funeral (16-Apr-2010)

Director: Neil LaBute

Writer: Dean Craig

Music: Christophe Beck

Producers: Chris Rock; Share Stallings; Laurence Malkin; Sidney Kimmel; William Horberg

Keywords: Comedy

Ensemble comedy follows a funeral ceremony as it devolves into a ridiculous farce.

ABSTRACT

Boasting an ensemble cast featuring the likes of Chris Rock and Martin Lawrence, Death at a Funeral focuses on a funeral ceremony for brothers Aaron and Ryan's father as it turns from a routine ceremony into a sideshow featuring hallucinogenic drugs, rampant violence, and a dwarf.
